content: this bag features a simple yet pretty stitch pattern the bag is a fairly good size making it great for using everyday as you run errands or do your shopping skill level easy materials yarn lily sugar n cream yarn - cone worsted weight #4 100% cotton 400g/14oz 645 meters/706yds color sage 1 cone crochet hook h 5 00mm other measuring tape scissors yarn needle measurements gauge 10 single_crochet sts = 3 finished size laid flat 17 wide by 14 high not counting the handles the written pattern is in american terminology you may sell your finished items the pattern itself however is for personal use only
